Description:
Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater in a suspicious directory, which is often used in DLL side-loading attacks

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious GUP Usage
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\gup.exe' and  not ((process_path like '%\program files
otepad++\updater\gup.exe' or process_path like '%\program files (x86)
otepad++\updater\gup.exe') or (process_path like '%\users\%' and (process_path like '%\appdata\local
otepad++\updater\gup.exe' or process_path like '%\appdataoaming
otepad++\updater\gup.exe'))))
